weapon.name: Precious One
weapon.description: A rare collectible weapon fused with unique trendy refits. May the wielder walk with courage into the desolate darkness, even if like a moth to the flame.

weaponEffects.title: Frost Resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increase frost ATK by **15%** and frost resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

weaponEffects.title: Elementalist
weaponEffects.description: Increase final damage by **NaN%** for every **1** type of weapon element equipped. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot.

normals.name: Withering Cold
normals.description:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch **5** consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **112.1%** of ATK plus **673** and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **130.5%** of ATK plus **783** and knock the target back. 
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **213.2%** of ATK plus **1279** and suspend the target.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **329%** of ATK plus **1974** and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **222.5%** of ATK plus **1335** and launch the target.

normals.name: Thaw
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack **5** times in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **132.2%** of ATK plus **793**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **158.6%** of ATK plus **952**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **248.6%** of ATK plus **1491**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **343.5%** of ATK plus **2061**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **334.5%** of ATK plus **2007** and launch the target.

normals.name: Piercing Cold
normals.description: While using normal attack on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Piercing Cold, dealing damage equal to **345.1%** of ATK plus **2070**.

normals.name: Sharp Chill
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using a Jetpack to trigger Sharp Chill.
While falling, deal damage equal to **57.5%** of ATK plus **345** each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **344.9%** of ATK plus **2069** and launch the target.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

dodge.name: Snowy Flurry
dodge.description: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Snowy Flurry, dealing damage equal to **162.8%** of ATK plus **977** to nearby targets.

dodge.name: Winter Solstice
dodge.description: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Winter Solstice, dealing damage equal to **162.9%** of ATK plus **977** damage to nearby targets.

skill.name: Desolate Day
skill.description:
Deal damage to nearby targets up to **660%** of ATK plus **3960** and create **2** regulation Speedy Yo-yos. Cooldown: **60** seconds. Reduce the speed of targets within range of Desolate Day by **50%** (does not affect Wanderers or bosses).
Each Speedy Yo-yo passes through the center of the trajectory about **4** times in each motion cycle, dealing damage equal to **30%** of ATK plus **180** to targets within the trajectory, for **70** seconds. The motion cycle lasts for **4** seconds when the weapon is **0** stars. During this period, using Desolate Day will refresh the position and duration of the Speedy Yo-yo. Cooldown: **4** seconds.
While Desolate Day is in use, reduce damage taken by **50%** and recover **5%** of Max HP. This cannot be affected by any healing boost effects. Recovery and damage reduction will not take effect in Apex League.

skill.name: Return to Loneliness
skill.description:
Use Capped Knowledge to obtain up to **2** uses of the new skill Return to Loneliness. This skill can only be used while Desolate Day is in cooldown. Deal skill damage equal to **440%** of ATK plus **2640**. While the skill is in use, reduce damage taken by **50%** and recover **5%** of Max HP. This cannot be affected by any incoming or outgoing healing boost effects. Recovery and damage reduction will not take effect in Apex League.
While Fortitude Resonance is active: Use Return to Loneliness and taunt nearby targets to gain **1** stack of blocking shield, up to **3** stacks, for **20** seconds. **Blocking points** are equal to the **sum of the Wanderer's **5** resistance types**. When the blocking shield is used up or overflows, deal damage equal to **200% of blocking points** to the main target.
While Benediction Resonance is active: Using Return to Loneliness against targets with greater than **95%** HP will deal damage equal to **8%** of their respective Max HP (does not affect Wanderers). This cannot be affected by damage boost or reduction effects.

discharge.name: Capped Knowledge
discharge.description: When **weapon charge is full** or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer**, dealing damage equal to **1113.9%** of ATK plus **6683** to nearby targets, and launching the target. During this period, gain damage immunity for **1.5** seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.description:
When any weapon skill is used, Speedy Yo-yo can trigger **harmony**, dealing damage to nearby targets equal to **undefined%** of the Wanderer's lost HP. The damage dealt shall be no less than **undefined%** of the Wanderer's Max ATK, and no more than **undefined%** of the Wanderer's Max ATK. The type of elemental damage dealt will be that of the current weapon.
When any weapon discharge is used, Speedy Yo-yo can trigger **tuning**, dealing damage to nearby targets equal to **undefined%** of the Wanderer's Max HP. The damage dealt shall be no more than **undefined%** of the Wanderer's Max ATK. The type of elemental damage dealt will be that of the current weapon.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.

When using Desolate Day, Speedy Yo-yo can trigger **undefined** seconds of **swiftness**: Speedy Yo-yo's speed is increased by **undefined%**, damage is increased by **160%**, and damage caused by passing through the target is converted to small-area damage.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.
Increases the damage of Speedy Yo-yo and Return to Loneliness by **undefined%**.
Increase final damage by **undefined%** while Speedy Yo-yo is active.

matrice.name: Icarus
matrice.description: Strategies and plans. My fate lies in my hands.

set.set_2: Equipping Precious One, **2** or more weapons of different elements, or **2** or more types of weapons increases all elemental damage by **8%**/**9%**/**10%**/**11%**. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.set_4: When dealing frost damage, increase all elemental damage by **13%**/**16%**/**19%**/**22%** for **2500** seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
